cards.title: A lifelike Ailey
cards.desc: Realtime Raytracing, Bloomhair and other state-of-the-art rendering technologies are applied to create a live, vivid Ailey.

cards.title: custom engine
cards.desc: A proprietary real-time custom engine allows for nearly an infinite number of movements to define Ailey's appearance and implement natural behavior.

cards.title: real-time MOVEMENTS
cards.desc: Through the Skeleton skinning system, It embodies real-time muscle movements that you can't see anywhere else.

cards.title: Deep-Learning
cards.desc: With the application of active Deep-Learning, Ailey increasingly responds to human-like behaviors.
